name: Glasscity Beaker Ice Bong | 10 inch | Blue
description:
Glasscity Beaker Ice Bong | 10 inch | Blue 
 This stylish beaker base ice bong is part of the Glasscity line, a line of high-quality glass bongs developed by Grasscity for very affordable prices. This compact piece has been made from clear, heat resistant borosilicate glass and measures 25.5 cm / 10 inches in height. It features an 18.8mm ground joint and comes delivered with a slitted inside-cut 18.8mm > 14.5mm diffuser downstem and a 14.5mm male herb bowl with glass handle for easy lifting. A blue keck clip is included with your purchase to safely keep the diffuser downstem in place. 
 The smoke is separated and filtered as it gets pulled through the downstems submerged slits and the three ice notches enable you to place a few ice cubes in the bongs tube for an extra cool toke. This important filtration and cooling results in a smoother, more enjoyable hit that's still packed with flavor but less harsh on the throat and lungs. 
 The bongs roomy beaker base allows the smoke to cool off more then with a straight shooter and provides great stability as well. The thick mouthpiece is rimmed, which makes if very comfortable to use even for longer sessions. The rim of the mouthpiece is constructed from blue glass and a black Glasscity decal can be found just below the mouthpiece. 
 This awesome beaker ice bong is ideal for enjoying on your own and big enough to share with friends. This compact beaker bong and many other great designs from the Glasscity line are available to order online today, while stock lasts at the number one smoke shop Grasscity.com.

Grasscity Crazy Combo Deal | Dab Egg

name: Trailer Park Boys Handheld Bubbler with Slitted Diffuser
description:
Trailer Park Boys Handheld Bubbler with Slitted Diffuser 
 The Trailer Park Boys have put their heads together again and came up with another great glass piece to add to their collection. The powerful water filtration that this portable handheld bubbler has to offer is simply astonishing and the best part is that you can take it with you on the go, without it taking up to much space. It features a roomy bowl that can hold a nice amount of herb and the angled bottom allows you to place it down on a flat surface without having to worry about it tipping over. 
 To use just place a little bit of water in the bubbler, the water filters the smoke and cools it downs significantly for a much smoother hit then using a dry pipe. Make sure to refresh the water regularly, as this will improve the flavor of your hit. All that is left to do is fill up the bowl with your favorite herbs and fire it up. 
 The slits in the fixed diffuser downstem separate the smoke and break it up into smaller particles, increasing the surface area and enhancing filtration. The clear glass body allows you to see when the bubbler is filled up with smoke, so you know when to inhale. A maria is placed on the middle of the stem to provide a much better grip. The Trailer Park Boys themselves decorate the body of the bubbler and the Trailer Park Boys decal is placed on the stem, so you know you got the real deal!

name: Cheech & Chong’s Jade East Vapor Bubbler | Black
description:
Cheech & Chong’s Jade East Vapor Bubbler | Black 
 Cheech & Chong's Jade East vapor bubbler is a powerful oil concentrate bubbler constructed from durable, heat-resistant borosilicate glass. The bubbler is equipped with a double-tier showerhead percolator that’s connected to the built-in downstem. It has a 14.5mm male joint and comes complete with a 14.5mm female vapor dome and a concentrate nail. The vapor dome is equipped with two handles for easy removal that also act as perfect roll stoppers. 
 The bubbly vapor is pulled down the fixed downstem and through the submerged slits in the double-tier showerhead percolator for filtration and cooling. This results in a smoother more enjoyable hit that’s full of flavor and less harsh on the throat and lungs. 
 The 18.5 cm / 7.25 inch tall bubbler has a straight neck that end with in a comfortable rimmed mouthpiece and comes with a thick circular foot that provides great stability. Beautiful black glass accents can be found on the handles of the included vapor dome, the rim of the circular foot and the rim of the mouthpiece. A matching black Cheech & Chong's decal is placed on the front of the vapor bubblers body and straight neck. 
 This solid Jade East dab rig from the Cheech & Chong's Up In Smoke glassware collection will impress all your smoke buddies and comes delivered in a themed box. Check out our wide selection of quality bubblers, bongs and hand pipes available to order at Grasscity.com, your number one online head shop.

name: Black Leaf - Portable Bubbler with Inline Hole Diffuser
description:
Black Leaf – Portable Bubbler with Inline Hole Diffuser 
 This glass bubbler by Black Leaf measures 12cm (4.7 inches) in height and is especially designed for smoking herbs on the go. This complete set is equipped with a built-in hole diffuser and a 14mm female glass herb bowl. 
 The built-in percolator has a hole diffusor and a recycle function - the water is swirled by the diffusor with 3 holes, drawn through the tube and flows back into the main chamber. The water is oxygenated and harmful substances get stuck at the wall, ensuring a smoother hit that is very easy on the lungs and throat, but still packed with flavor. 
 The bud-shaped mouthpiece on this bubbler is slightly bent, so it can be used in a more comfortable position. So you can kick back and relax whilst using it! 
 The Black Leaf recycler logo is beautifully placed on the front of the body.

name: Glasscity Glass Handheld Bubbler with Showerhead Diffuser - 60% SALE Special
description:
Glasscity Glass Handheld Bubbler with Showerhead Diffuser 
 Get blown away by its powerful water filtration. The Glass Handheld Bubbler with Showerhead Diffuser has all the features you need for a silky smooth, perfectly filtered hit, but still remains compact enough to take with you on the go. Equipped with a fixed downstem with slitted showerhead diffuser, an 18.8mm glass bowl with handle and a angled bottom that allows you to place it down on a flat surface without having to worry about it tipping over, all in one beautiful handheld smoking device. 
 To use just place a little bit of water in the bubbler, the water filters the smoke and cools it downs significantly for a much smoother hit then using a dry pipe. Make sure to refresh the water regularly, as this will improve the flavor of your hit. All that is left to do is fill up the bowl with your favorite herbs and fire it up. 
 The slits in the showerhead diffuser separate the smoke and break it up into smaller particles, increasing the surface area and enhancing filtration. The clear glass body allows you to see when the bubbler is filled up with smoke. Spiral grooves in the body and stem create a swirling airflow, which allows the smoke to cool significantly better, resulting in a much milder hit. Simply lift the bowl to enjoy the amazingly smooth hits that this compact bubbler has to offer.

name: Glasscity Recycler Vapor Bubbler with Showerhead & Honeycomb Disc Perc
description:
Glasscity Recycler Vapor Bubbler with Showerhead & Honeycomb Disc Perc 
 The multi-tubed, recycler vapor bubbler is part of our own scientific Glasscity line of quality glass that we offer at a very affordable price. This handmade bubbler is the perfect piece of glass to enjoy your waxy concentrates and oils with. The vapor bubbler is equipped with a reinforced fixed downstem with a 14.5mm male joint. To complete the set up a glass banger with female joint is included with your purchase. 
 This handmade borosilicate glass bubbler works by pulling the vapor through the submerged slits in the showerhead percolator and then through the multiple holes in the honeycomb disc percolator for filtration and cooling. The vapor is then drawn into the two recycle chambers where it gets recycled again before exiting through the mouthpiece. This continuous recycling process cools and filters the smoke resulting in a smoother hit that is very easy on the lungs and throat, but still packed with the wonderful flavors that your concentrates have to offer. 
 This compact 22 cm / 8.7 inch tall bubbler features a slightly bent flared mouthpiece that allows you to use it in a more comfortable position. So kick back, relax en enjoy those perfectly filtered hits. This quality dab rig features black glass accents on the rim of the stable circular foot, on the rim of the mouthpiece and on the two decorative marbles that sit on top of the two recycling chambers.The piece is finished with a matching black Glasscity decal on its clear body. 
 This intricate looking recycler bubbler is great fun to watch as the vapor winds its way through the multiple cooling tubes and it works hard to deliver consistently rich, filtered hits. This powerful recycler is available to order today at Grasscity.com, the number one smoke shop for quality bubblers, bongs and accessories at unbeatable prices.

name: Snoop Dogg Pounds Lightship Handheld Bubbler
description:
Snoop Dogg Pounds Lightship Handheld Bubbler 
 Snoop Dogg Pounds launched some seriously spectacular bongs and bubblers in the past, but when you are out and about, you need a portable smoking device that will fit in your pocket or purse. That is why Snoop Dogg Pounds added some very beautiful compact handheld pieces to their collection and the Lightship Handheld Bubbler is one of them. 
 Made from only the highest quality borosilicate glass, the Lightship is the ultimate combination of portability and water filtration. To use, place a little bit of water in the bubbler, the water filters the smoke and cools it downs significantly for a much smoother hit then using a dry pipe. Make sure to refresh the water regularly, as this will improve the flavor of your hit. All that is left to do is fill up the bowl with your favorite herbs and fire it up. 
 The holes in the fixed diffuser downstem separate the smoke and break it up into smaller particles, increasing the surface area and enhancing filtration. The clear glass body allows you to see the bubbler filling up with smoke, so you know when you can start inhaling. 
 The carb hole is placed on the left side of the bowl for more control of your hits. The bottom of the bowl is angled, which enables you to place it on a flat surface without the risk of it tipping over and breaking. The mouthpiece is flattened for a hit that is more dosed, which makes it easier on the lungs and throat. 
 The Lightship comes with colored accents on the stem and fixed diffuser. It is available in a wide range of colors, so there is bound to be one that suits your personal style. The Snoop Dogg fist decal is placed on the front of the bubbler and on the stem you will find Snoop Dogg’s signature, so you know you got the real deal.

name: Glasscity Beaker Base Mini Bong | 10 Inch | Blue - 40% SUPER SALE Special
description:
Glasscity Beaker Base Mini Bong | 10 Inch | Blue 
 The compact 10 inch beaker base mini bong and bubbler in one is yet another innovative design from the Glasscity glass collection. It features a completely demountable design that is very easy to disassemble, which makes cleaning a lot less time consuming. It also means that you are able to use it in two different set-ups, due to similar size ground joints on the top and on the side. Use it as a bong by placing the tube on top, or as a bubbler by placing the tube on the side of the body. 
 The body consists of two parts: the beaker base and the tube that are tightly held together by a keck clip. The roomy beaker base provides enough room for the smoke to cool before it moves into the tube. The slim tube is equipped with two Maria, which is pushed glass that results in decorative bulges. The Maria’s not only add to the overall appearance, but provides you with a much better grip as well. The mouthpiece is flared, enabling you to curl it around your lips when you inhale. 
 To make this set-up complete a blue inside-cut 18.8mm > 14.5mm slitted diffuser downstem and a clear glass herb bowl are included with your purchase. Two matching blue keck clips keep the downstem and the tube firmly in place. A blue Glasscity decal adorns the bottom of the beaker base and the top of the tube.

name: Glasscity 4-arm Perc Beaker Ice Bong with Ash Catcher | Green
description:
Glasscity 4-arm Perc Beaker Ice Bong with Ash Catcher | Green 
 It is Glasscity’s mission to make quality glass accessible for everybody. Take this beautiful beaker base ice bong for instance, its curvy silhouette and green glass accents make this percolator ice bong the perfect addition to any glass collection. 
 It features a clear, slitted 4-arm tree percolator for amazing diffusion the added ice notches allow you to place a few ice cubes in the tube for an even smoother, cooler hit. 
 This percolator ice bong comes complete with an inside-cut 18.8mm > 14.5mm diffuser downstem and a green glass ash catcher that keeps unwanted ash and debris out of your water. The bongs tube is decorated with a matching green decal and the flat base provides excellent stability. 
 If you are in need of a quality bong, but you are on a tight budget, then this beaker base percolator ice bong with 4-arm tree percolator by Glasscity is your perfect match. It perfectly combines a superb smoking experience with a stylish exterior, all for a very affordable price.

name: Pax 3 Portable Vaporizer | Basic Kit | Matte Rose Gold
description:
Pax 3 Portable Vaporizer | Basic Kit | Matte Rose Gold 
 The Pax 3 is the latest addition to the popular PAX line of portable vaporizers. By improving their heating system and battery, and adding haptic feedback, PAX Labs have delivered an even smarter, faster, and stronger portable vaporizer than previous models. The Pax 3 also features a mobile app for Android and iOS that gives users more control over their vape sessions. 
 The smooth, durable exterior is made of highly polished, anodized aluminum that is designed to last. The Pax 3 is ideal for vaping both dry herbs and waxy concentrates, although you need to purchase the concentrate insert to be able to switch to concentrates. By using the leak proof, wax concentrate insert you easily switch from loose leaf to extract in seconds. The concentrate insert is not included in the basic kit, but can be ordered separately. Pax Labs recommends using the highest heat setting with the wax concentrate insert for optimal vaporization. 
 The powerful 3500mAh lithium ion battery charges in about 90 minutes, reaches the lowest vaping temperature in just 15 seconds and the hottest temperature in only 20 seconds. Select one of the four temperatures settings (360 °F,  380 °F , 400 °F , or 420 °F ) and start vaping in seconds! 
 The Pax 3 allows users to control temperature in a variety of new ways through the mobile app. Exploring new vapor profiles is as simple as a few taps on your smartphone. "Boost Mode" reduces cooling in between sessions, "Efficiency Mode" gradually turns up the heat as the session carries on, "Stealth Mode" cools the unit down fast, reducing indiscrete odors and "Flavor Mode" only heats when you take a hit. For added discretion and convenience, the devices haptic feedback (vibration alerts) conveniently vibrates when the device is ready for use. 
 The Pax 3 is a discreet and portable dry herb and concentrate vaporizer that delivers high purity vapor in just seconds and comes with a 10-year warranty. For more info,  please check out the warranty page on their site!   Accessories (Included): 
 
 1 x PAX 3 Device 
 1 x USB Charging cable & dock 
 2 x Mouthpieces 
 1 x Maintenance kit

name: Glasscity 4-arm Perc Beaker Ice Bong with Ash Catcher | Black
description:
Glasscity 4-arm Perc Beaker Ice Bong with Ash Catcher | Black 
 It is Glasscity’s mission to make quality glass accessible for everybody. Take this beautiful beaker base ice bong for instance, its curvy silhouette and black glass accents make this percolator ice bong the perfect addition to any glass collection. 
 It features a clear, slitted 4-arm tree percolator for amazing diffusion the added ice notches allow you to place a few ice cubes in the tube for an even smoother, cooler hit. 
 This percolator ice bong comes complete with an inside-cut 18.8mm > 14.5mm diffuser downstem and a black glass ash catcher that keeps unwanted ash and debris out of your water. The bongs tube is decorated with a matching black decal and the flat base provides excellent stability. 
 If you are in need of a quality bong, but you are on a tight budget, then this beaker base percolator ice bong with 4-arm tree percolator by Glasscity is your perfect match. It perfectly combines a superb smoking experience with a stylish exterior, all for a very affordable price.

name: Glass Skull Bowl with Quartz Bucket Vapor Swing | Clear
description:
Glass Skull Bowl with Quartz Bucket Vapor Swing | Clear 
 Smoke your herbs as well as your concentrates all from one bowl with this clear glass skull bowl with quartz bucket vapor swing. The perfect add-on for those who enjoy the best of both worlds. 
 The bowl is constructed from thick, high-quality borosilicate glass that can take a beating. The extremely deep bowl can hold a massive amount of herb, which makes it perfect for those experienced smokers that like to place large amounts of herb in their bowl. It is equipped with quite a narrow opening, but if you want to prevent any unwanted ash or herb crumbs from traveling into the bong water it is better to use a metal screen. 
 The back of the bowl is equipped with a tube that holds the quartz glass vapor swing. Two rubber grommets safely keep your vapor swing in place. The swing arm allows you turn the bucket and heat it up from the bottom, before placing it back into the bowl and applying your concentrates in it. Quartz glass is know for a quick heat up time and providing the purest flavor possible, which makes it the ideal material for dabbing. 
 If you are looking for an all-in-one attachment for your bong or bubbler, this is the perfect add-on for you The bowl features a male joint that will seamlessly fit in any female glass-on-glass joint in a similar joint size. We offer it in both an 18.8mm as well as a 14.5mm joint size. Please select the joint size of your preference from the available options in the dropdown menu when you place your order.

name: Pax 2 Portable Dry Herb Vaporizer | Charcoal
description:
Pax 2 Portable Dry Herb Vaporizer | Charcoal 
 The stunning PAX 2 features a streamlined design with up to 30% higher battery capacity, a deeper oven chamber that heats evenly for optimal vapor, and it is 25% smaller and 10% lighter than the Original PAX vaporizer. 
  Smarter & Better! 
 The PAX 2 has 4 temperature settings with lip-sensing, motion-sensing, and auto-cooling technologies that intelligently self-optimize power and temperature during use. The PAX 2 has a one-button interface and requires minimal maintenance making it very simple and efficient. PAX 2 also features a magnetic USB charging dock and a more efficient battery that heats up the PAX 2 in less than a minute. And to top it all of, PAX 2 includes Party Mode to enhance your social experience, including the game “Simon”! 
 With a polished, anodized aluminum shell, PAX 2 is refined and durable. Built to last with the highest-grade parts, and backed with a 2-year warranty from the supplier. For more info,  please check out the warranty page on their site! 
 The PAX 2 has 4 temperature settings: 360ºF, 380ºF, 400ºF and 420ºF, so whetcher you like light silky vapor or dense clouds of milky vapor, the Pax 2 delivers it all! 
 Accessories (Included): 
 
 1 x Pax 2 Device 
 1 x USB Charger 
 1 x Maintance Kit 
 2 x Mouthpiece

name: Glasscity Glass Dab Rig with Drum Perc | Amber
description:
Glasscity Glass Dab Rig with Drum Perc | Amber 
 Take your dab sessions to the next level with the Glass Dab Rig with Drum Perc designed by Glasscity. Perfectly filtered hits in a compact dab rig with straight design, made from the best quality heatproof borosilicate glass, all for a very affordable price. 
 As you pull the smoke travels through the reinforced fixed downstem into the drum percolator. Numerous amounts of slits in the drum percolator break up the smoke into smaller particles, increasing the surface area for optimal filtration, so you can enjoy a smooth hit that is packed with flavor, but extremely gentle on the throat. 
 This glass dab rig features a female 14.5mm joint and comes delivered complete with a 14.5mm glass banger with male joint. The mouthpiece is slightly bent, which enables you to smoke in a more relaxing position. Amber accents on the mouthpiece and on the thick, stable round foot give this dab rig an even more elegant appearance. 
 Enjoy your concentrates in style with this quality dab rig by Glasscity. Don’t let its size fool you though, it might look small, but it delivers big time!

name: Glasscity Glass Dab Rig with Double Showerhead Perc | Blue
description:
Glasscity Glass Dab Rig with Double Showerhead Perc | Blue 
 In search of a compact quality dab rig to enjoy your concentrates to the max, but for a minimal price? Look no further, because this elegant dab rig with double showerhead percolator by Glasscity has all the features you need to savor your concentrates in style. 
 Made from the finest quality borosilicate glass this dab rig is designed to withstand the test of time. It is equipped with a reinforced fixed downstem with a 14.5mm male joint and it comes delivered complete with a glass banger with female joint. The banger curves away from the rig, providing you with a much more convenient dabbing access, but also keeps the heat further away from the body. 
 The double showerhead percolator consist of two showerhead percolators stacked upon each other. Each of the percolators features a generous amount of slits that are designed to break up the smoke into smaller particles, increasing the surface area for optimal filtration, which results in a smooth hit that is packed with all the wonderful flavors that your concentrates have to offer, but extremely gentle on the throat and lungs. 
 Blue accents on the mouthpiece and on the thick, stable round foot give this dab rig a unique appearance. Decorative bulges, also known as “maria’s” are placed on the tube to provide you with an excellent grip.

name: Glasscity Glass Beaker Base Dab Rig with Showerhead Diffuser | Blue
description:
Glasscity Glass Beaker Base Dab Rig with Showerhead Diffuser | Blue 
 This glass dab rig with showerhead diffuser by Glasscity is the ultimate combination of the portability of a handheld glass pipe with the water filtration of a bong. Its stable beaker base provides great stability, so you can place it down without having to worry about it tipping over. This compact dab rig is the perfect smoking device to enjoy your concentrate, as it preserves all the wonderful flavors, but remains extremely soft on the throat and lungs. 
 As you pull the smoke travels through the fixed downstem into the slitted showerhead percolator. The slits in the showerhead percolator break up the smoke into smaller particles, increasing the surface area and enhancing filtration for a much smoother hit that still packs a punch. 
 The Glasscity dab rig has a 14.5mm female joint and comes delivered complete with a quality heat proof 14.5mm male glass banger. Blue glass accents can be found on the fixed downstem, the showerhead diffuser and on the rim of the mouthpiece. The mouthpiece is slightly bent, which enables you to smoke it in a more laid back position. So get those feet up, relax and enjoy your precious concentrates in style with this Glasscity dab rig.

name: Colored Glass Skull Bowl | Small
description:
Colored Glass Skull Bowl | Small 
 You don’t have to dig six feet deep to get your hands on this skull. This colored glass skull bowl instantly makes your bong look creepier and your smoke sessions a lot more interesting. 
 The bowl is constructed from thick, high-quality, heat resistant borosilicate glass that can take a beating. Even though the deep bowl has quite a narrow opening, we do recommend using a metal screen to prevent any unwanted ash or herb crumbs from traveling into the bong water. This helps to keep your water cleaner and your hits more enjoyable. 
 Two glass marbles on the both sides of the skull head act as roll stoppers,  preventing the bowl from unexpectedly rolling off a flat surface and breaking. 
 The bowl is available in the colors: green and blue and in a both a 14.5mm as well as an 18.8mm joint size. Please select the size and color of your preference from the available options in the dropdown menu when placing your order.

name: Humboldt Hemp Wick Full Flame | 5ft
description:
Humboldt Hemp Wick Full Flame | 5ft 
 Humboldt Hemp Wick is a 100% organic wick that is used as a clean-burning, chemical-free flame source designed for avid smokers and connoisseurs around the world. The organic hemp wick is a more healthy alternative to using a regular lighter as it removes the risk of breathing in unwanted butane, metals and noxious gases. 
 The 100% organic hemp fibers go through a special process where they saturated and cured in 100% organic beeswax. This process enhances the overall taste and smoking experience making the hemp wick ideal for safely lighting up your bongs, cigarettes, cigars and pipes. The renewable resources used to make Humboldt Hemp Wick are as kind to the planet as they are to your lungs. 
 Humboldt Hemp Wick is made in Humboldt County, California using only the finest organic materials. They even have their own beehives and every inch of Humboldt Hemp Wick is made as locally as possible. The water resistant, 100% organic wicks are a must have for conscious smokers everywhere and they make a great affordable gift. Order your Humboldt Hemp Wick online today at the number one smoke shop Grasscity.com.

name: NoGoo - 420 Dome & Dabber Station - Available in 4 colors
description:
NoGoo – 420 Dome & Dabber Station – Available in 4 colors 
 The NoGoo 420 Dome & Dabber Station is made entirely of 100% Platinum cured Silicone and can house 14mm and 18mm dome, slides, and adapters, with space for “hot” nails and dabbers too. Great for keeping your components organized, leaving your table spotless.   
 If you love to vape your concentrates but hate the sticky mess that can happen, look no further than NoGoo. The 100% Platinum cured Silicone surface is unbreakable, heat resistant and will not allow anything to stick, keeping your concentrates in check and contained. Conserve your stuff and limit mess, this is the way to go with NoGoo. 
 
 This is a Dome & Dabber stand only and does not come with any tools or accessories.

name: NoGoo - 420 Stand - Available in 4 colors
description:
NoGoo – 420 Stand – Available in 4 colors 
 The NoGoo 420 Stand is made entirely of 100% Platinum cured Silicone and can house either a 14mm or 18mm slide with spots for a few pokers or dabbers. Great for keeping your components organized, leaving your table spotless.  
 If you love to vape your concentrates but hate the sticky mess that can happen, look no further than NoGoo. The 100% Platinum cured Silicone surface is unbreakable, heat resistant and will not allow anything to stick, keeping your concentrates in check and contained! Conserve your stuff and limit mess, this is the way to go with NoGoo.

name: RAW Connoisseur King Size Slim Hemp Rolling Papers With Filter Tips - Single Pack
description:
RAW Connoisseur King Size Slim Hemp Rolling Papers With Filter Tips - Single Pack 
 RAW Natural rolling papers are made of unbleached, translucent light brown hemp paper and hemp-based gum with RAW's patented CrissCross watermark for slow, even burning. These RAW Connoisseur King Size Slim hemp rolling papers come with filter tips so all you need is something to smoke and you're on your way! One pack contains 32 papers and filter tips.

name: I-Tal Hemp Wick | Small
description:
The Original I-Tal Hemp Wick | Small 
 This waterproof hemp wick by I-Tal is designed to light your joint or bowl without inhaling any chemical butane, which is releases when using a lighter or torch. Made of organic hemp that is saturated and cured in beeswax, I-Tal Hemp Wick is designed to be lit and used as a clean-burning, chemical-free flame source. Simply light the wick with a lighter or torch and use it as you heat source for your joint, bong or bubber. Prolong the life of your lighters and enjoy improved taste from your smoke without inhaling butane! This small size pack extends to 120 cm / 47.25 inches.

name: Cones - Premium King Size Pre-Rolled Paper Cones - Pack of 12
description:
Cones - Premium King Size Pre-Rolled Paper Cones - Pack of 12 
 Pre-rolled cones are the ultimate convenience in rolling because you only need to fill them up with whatever you like to smoke, twist off the end and light up! This blister pack contains 12 pre-rolled, slow-burning, premium quality king-size paper cones from the popular Cones brand, ready to go with heavy paper filter tips and packaged with a straw inside to help maintain their shape until you're ready to use them.

name: RAW Organic King Size Slim Hemp Rolling Papers - Single Pack
description:
RAW Organic King Size Slim Hemp Rolling Papers - Single Pack 
 RAW Organic rolling papers are made of organically-grown, chlorine-free hemp paper and hemp-based gum, minimally processed in an eco-friendly manner. Like classic RAW Natural papers, these feature RAW's patented CrissCross watermark for slow, even burning, but the translucent brown color is much lighter and varies depending on the shade of the hemp used in production. If you normally buy another brand of King Size papers, give these a try and you'll be surprised by how light and smooth these are. If you find that the hemp-based gum doesn't stick as well as the usual arabic gum you're used to, just run the flame of your lighter along the length of your joint to give the gum a little boost of stickiness. One pack contains 32 papers.

name: Grasscity Mills Aluminum Herb Grinder with Slotted Grip | 4-Part
description:
Grasscity Mills Aluminum Herb Grinder with Slotted Grip | 4-Part 
 From the land of wooden shoes, cheese and windmills Grasscity present its very own brand of grinders: Grasscity Mills. Designed and created to deliver you only the best quality grinders for a much better price than all the other premium quality grinders available on the market today! 
 Take this portable 4-part Grasscity Mills Aluminum Herb Grinder for instance, it doesn’t get much better than this. Its compact design makes it ideal for on the go and the slots in the top and bottom of the grinder provides an extreme comfortable grip. The lid is magnetized for a secure fit and the nylon friction ring ensures smooth grinding. 
 Lift up the lid to reveal the razor sharp, perfectly positioned, CNC machined teeth, designed to efficiently gnash through even the toughest plant materials for a fine, dry herbal mix. This grinder is equipped with a fine mesh screen that filters and collects pollen dust. Your precious pollen dust can easily be gathered for re-use with the included scraper in the very bottom part of the grinder, so nothing goes to waste. 
 This Aluminum Herb Grinder is a great choice for smokers on a budget looking for quality grinder that is compact enough for on the go. It also makes a great gift for your fellow smoker friends as it comes delivered in a stylish, easy to store box.  It is available in silver and black, so make sure to select the color of your preference in the drop down menu when you place your order.

name: Juicy Jay's Blueberry Regular Size Rolling Papers - Single Pack
description:
Juicy Jay's Blueberry Flavored Regular Size Rolling Papers - Single Pack 
 Unlike many other flavored rolling papers, only Juicy Jay's are made with their famous "triple-dipped" flavoring system that not only flavors the paper but sweetens it. The natural flavors of your smoke are enhanced, leaving a mouth-watering tastiness on your lips! 
 Only soy-based ink and natural sugar gum are used to make Juicy Jay's fruity blueberry-flavored regular size rolling papers that measure 35mm across. One pack contains 32 papers.

name: Grasscity Mills Aluminum Crank Herb Grinder | 4-Part
description:
Grasscity Mills Aluminum Crank Herb Grinder | 4-Part 
 From the land of wooden shoes, cheese and windmills Grasscity present its very own brand of grinders: Grasscity Mills. Created to deliver you solely the best quality grinders that will grind up your herbs into the perfect consistency with great ease, but for a much better price than all the other premium quality grinders on the market today! 
 Crank it up a notch with the Grasscity Mills Aluminum Crank Herb Grinder. The crank arm turns effortlessly to break up your herbs into the perfect fluffy consistency, ready for use. The grinders see-through lid acts as a window into the grinder, which allows you to see exactly when your herbs are as desired. 
 This grinder easily unscrews into four parts. The top two parts are the actual grinder, which is equipped with razor sharp, perfectly positioned, CNC machined teeth. So you can rest assured that it will grind up your herbs into the ideal consistency in only a few turns of the handle. The nylon friction ring ensures smooth, wear-free grinding. In the bottom part of the grinder you will find a fine mesh pollen screen for gathering that precious pollen dust, which you can scrape out of the very bottom of the grinder with the included scraper. 
 This solid grinder is a great choice for smokers who are not that physically strong or medical patients as it gives fantastic results with very little effort and all at a bargain price. The Grasscity Mills Aluminum Crank Herb Grinder comes delivered in an easy to store box and is available in black, red, green, gold and blue, so there is bound to be a color that suits your style. name: Pax 2 Portable Dry Herb Vaporizer | Platinum
description:
Pax 2 Portable Dry Herb Vaporizer | Platinum 
 The stunning PAX 2 features a streamlined design with up to 30% higher battery capacity, a deeper oven chamber that heats evenly for optimal vapor, and it is 25% smaller and 10% lighter than the Original PAX vaporizer. 
  Smarter & Better! 
 The PAX 2 has 4 temperature settings with lip-sensing, motion-sensing, and auto-cooling technologies that intelligently self-optimize power and temperature during use. The PAX 2 has a one-button interface and requires minimal maintenance making it very simple and efficient. PAX 2 also features a magnetic USB charging dock and a more efficient battery that heats up the PAX 2 in less than a minute. And to top it all of, PAX 2 includes Party Mode to enhance your social experience, including the game “Simon”! 
 With a polished, anodized aluminum shell, PAX 2 is refined and durable. Built to last with the highest-grade parts, and backed with a 2-year warranty from the supplier. For more info,  please check out the warranty page on their site! 
 The PAX 2 has 4 temperature settings: 360ºF, 380ºF, 400ºF and 420ºF, so whetcher you like light silky vapor or dense clouds of milky vapor, the Pax 2 delivers it all! 
 Accessories (Included): 
 
 1 x Pax 2 Device 
 1 x USB Charger 
 1 x Maintance Kit 
 2 x Mouthpiece

name: Grav Labs Glass Blunt - Small
description:
Grav Labs Glass Blunt - Small 
 No time to roll one? Using this glass blunt couldn't be easier! Just slide out the inner tube, fill the chamber with herb, and light it up! Push the tube in as you smoke to push the ashes out. Handmade by Grav Labs in Austin, Texas using high quality borosilicate glass, this is a blunt "wrap" you can fill and smoke over and over again! You can also use this glass pipe for vaping by placing your smoking material inside the tube and lighting it from underneath rather applying the flame directly to the plant material from the open tip. 
 This small glass blunt measures about 3 inches in length with the inner tube pushed all the way in. The Grav Labs logo decal is applied along the tube in red, green, black, blue or orange. Choose color when ordering (as available).

name: Grasscity The Weezy Jack-Pod Smoking Pipe
description:
Grasscity The Weezy Jack-Pod Smoking Pipe 
 Get ready for a revolutionary new way of smoking that is taking over the market by a storm with the Weezy. The Weezy is the first available cone-shaped one-hitter pipe on the market that works with an inventive pod-system called Jack-Pods. The Jack-Pods are small reusable pods that are completely recyclable and can carry up to 0.2 grams of your favorite herbs. 
 The Weezy works with refillable Jack-Pods that can be pre-filled, so you always have them ready, which makes it perfect for having a few quick hits when you are out and about. The refillable Jack-Pods can be used around 100 times and can easily be filled over and over again. The Weezy come in an airtight, smell proof storage container that pops open by squeezing the top of the container on both sides simultaneously. 
 To use, unscrew the top of the Weezy to get access to the Jack-Pod. Unscrew and fill up your Jack-Pod before placing your filled Jack-Pod back into the pipe. Ones you have reassembled the device all you have to do is fire it up. After having about two or three tokes, flip over your Jack-Pod for another few hits.  
 The Weezy offers an easier and cleaner smoking experience than any other regular pipes due to the replaceable active carbon filter that is placed in the mouthpiece. It filters most tar, ash and other unwanted components out of the smoke, for a cleaner, smoother and tastier smoking experience.

name: Glasscity Glass Spoon Pipe with Inside-Out Rasta Frit
description:
Glasscity Glass Spoon Pipe with Inside-Out Rasta Frit 
 Looking for a cool new portable hand pipe to add to your collection? Be sure to check out the Glass Spoon Pipe with Inside-Out Rasta Frit from the Glasscity hand pipe collection. Handcrafted from premium quality borosilicate glass and equipped with a deep bowl that can hold a nice amount of herb, this hand pipe is created provide you with years of smoking pleasure. 
 It measures only 10 cm / 4 inches in length, which makes it perfect to carry with you in your pocket or purse when you are out and about. The pipe features a rasta colored frit. A frit is a technique that uses colored, crushed glass to create a speckled effect within the pipe, for an amazing visual effect that becomes even more striking due to the inside-out glass. 
 To use the pipe, simply load the bowl with your favorite herb, put your thumb on the carb hole that is placed on the left side of the bowl and fire it up! We do recommend placing a metal screen in the bowl to prevent unwanted ash or herb crumbs from traveling down the pipe. The bulbous stem provides extra room for the smoke to cool, for a softer toke. Three glass marbles are placed on the right side of the bowl, not just as decoration, but they provide you with a better grip as well. The bottom of the bowl is slightly flattened to prevent the pipe from rolling off a flat surface and breaking. 
 This colorful rasta themed Glasscity spoon pipe will make a great addition to any glass collection. It will last for years if maintained correctly. Because each piece is handmade, the pattern might vary slightly from the pictures, but the overall design will be the same.

name: Glasscity Droop-Style Spoon Pipe with Inside-Out Frit | Yellow/Orange
description:
Glasscity Droop-Style Spoon Pipe with Inside-Out Frit | Yellow/Orange 
 Bring a ray of sunshine to your glass collection with this bright Droop-style spoon pipe with inside-out frit from the Glasscity collection. This pocket-size spoon pipe is made from high-quality borosilicate glass and is equipped with a deep bowl with a drop at the bottom. The big chamber provides extra volume capacity for that extra bit of cooling before you inhale. 
 Handcrafted from only the best borosilicate glass, this hand pipe is made to provide you with years of smoking pleasure. It measures only 11 cm / 4 inches in length, which makes it perfect to carry with you in your pocket or purse when you are out and about. The pipe features a yellow, orange and black frit. A frit is a technique that uses colored, crushed glass to create a speckled effect within the pipe, for an amazing visual effect that becomes even more striking due to the inside-out glass. The front of the bowl is adorned with a yellow and blue swirl, which is even more amazing to look at after a few hits! 
 To use the pipe, simply load the bowl with your favorite herb, put your thumb on the carb hole that is placed on the left side of the bowl and fire it up! We do recommend placing a metal screen in the bowl to prevent unwanted ash or herb crumbs from traveling down the pipe. Four dark green glass marbles are placed on the right side of the bowl, which not only adds to its overall appearance, but they provide you with a better grip as well. The bottom of the bowl is slightly flattened to prevent the pipe from rolling off a flat surface and breaking. 
 This bright Glasscity spoon pipe will make a great addition to any glass collection. It will last for years if maintained correctly. Because each piece is handmade, the pattern might vary slightly from the pictures, but the overall design will be the same.
